mapper.select: SELECT NF_TITLE FROM NOTIFICATION ORDER BY NF_CODE DESC

SELECT I.IQ_TITLE AS IQ_TITLE, I.IQ_CONTENT AS IQ_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(TRUNC(I.IQ_DATE),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS IQ_DATE, C.IQC_NAME AS IQC_NAME ,CASE WHEN IQ_READ IS NULL THEN '접수완료' WHEN I.IQ_CODE = A.IQ_CODE THEN '처리완료' ELSE '관리자 검토중' END AS IQ_STATE , I.US_CODE AS US_CODE , I.IQ_CODE AS IQ_CODE FROM INQUIARY I LEFT JOIN ANSWER A ON I.IQ_CODE = A.IQ_CODE JOIN INQUIARY_CATEGORY C ON I.IQC_CODE = C.IQC_CODE WHERE US_CODE = #{us_code}
